metadata.name: The Civic Centre
metadata.description:
The Civic Centre also called Civic Center Towers or Civic Towers is a 16 floor office building in Lagos. It is located a short distance from the Civic Centre on Ozumba Mbadiwe Avenue, Victoria Island, Lagos.

It was officially opened in 2015 and it is owned by Business Tycoon Uzor Christopher.

It is one of the largest and most important Convention Centers in the city. It has been the venue for many national and international events in the past and offers state of art event hosting services.

With it's three banqueting rooms, Grand Banquet Hall, Panoramic View Hall, Floating Restaurant and two Meeting Rooms offer breathtaking hospitality and service complete with incomparable value for money.
